title: Drawing, "Five Studies of Tree Tops, Rio Magdalena, Colombia", 1853, probably May
markings: Verso:  Stamped in ink, at center:  Lugt 457d
inscribed: Inscribed in graphite, at upper right:  2 splendid masses of / purple flowers - at tree/ & trees / some masses seem / to be in the bud and / appear greensih purp [le]; again, at center:  Large tree / flowers reddish purple / lilac; and at bottom left:  Massive tree, longitudinal / masses with many openings showing / the sky between.
description: Horizontal sheet containing five designs for tops of trees

tombstone.epitaph:
Drawing, "Five Studies of Tree Tops, Rio Magdalena, Colombia", 1853, probably May.
1853, probably May. Graphite on gray paper. Gift of Louis P. Church. 1917-4-850.
